Keywords: Cosmic , Guardians of the Galaxy , Pirate , Ravagers
Real Name: Yondu Udonta
Special Powers
TARGETING: Elevated
RALLY (3): All Attack Rolls . FREE: Remove one of Yondu's RALLY dice. If you do, this turn Yondu has [3 bolts] and deals penetrating damage.

Comments
September 29, 2022
TrexBeast87
This is really an oddball figure that hasn't seen competitive play at all that I have noticed. The obvious answer from most is going to be because there is better 50 point figures, or he just doesn't hold his own in the meta. But's look at some merits of why you should try this figure out. 1. Statistically speaking his rally die is underrated, with it being all attack rolls you will be surprised just how many rally dies he can accumulate in a game. Those extra 2 targets and penetrating synergies great with improved targeting elevated. 2. His pirate keyword. An underrated keyword that has got surprisingly really good under the radar, he gives much needed range to them. Teamed with XoS Deadpool he can now hide in water terrain. 3. Guardians TA. This is a criminally underrated team ability, negating the effects of perplex and even the emotional modifier is huge in today's game. 4 I'm Mary Poppins Y'all!!! I go into more detail on what you can do with him, but what is the fun of that for others, instead of saying this figure is useless or not good ( which there are some that are) Yondu is not one of them, he has a niche.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Most of his value is in his prob which is why i'm sure he'll see play on some teams. The rest of his dial is pretty average. The rally is kinda weak and stats are average.
